summary: The Vietnam Veterans Memorial lists the names of more than 58,000 men and women who were killed in the war. 380 names have been added to it since its 1982 dedication, for example, to correct omissions. Not all Vietnam-era military casualties are eligible. We reviewed how DOD adds names. We also looked at its responses to requests to add 74 sailors who died in 1969...
title: Vietnam Veterans Memorial: Process and Considerations for Adding Names to the Wall
